StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginTechTree_Name
StringTable.String: Return Drengin Tree

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginIndustrialSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Exploitation Specialization

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginIndustrialSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves our ability to exploit labor.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginIndustrialSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Forcing the population to do what you want may not always be the best way to do things, but it's almost always the fastest.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginConstructionOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Labor Management

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginConstructionOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Stop Wasting Slaves.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginConstructionOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: If we waste even a few less slavelings, we can make things faster or cheaper. Don't worry. We will still waste lots of slavelings.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginManufacturingFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Slavery Focus

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginManufacturingFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Begin using slavelings for the jobs they're best at.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginManufacturingFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: If we start using the slavelings for the jobs they're best at, or even breeding them that way, we can make everything more efficient.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginResearchOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Researcher Motivation

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginResearchOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our smart slavelings to be smarter. Or cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginResearchOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Getting more smarts out of the smart slavelings is tricky because of how fragile they are.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginTechnologicalFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Extraction Focus

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginTechnologicalFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our smart slavelings to be even more smarter.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginTechnologicalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Getting the most out of research slavelings is an art. It's just not one that they like very much.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginPlanetarySpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces planets to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginPlanetarySpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Making planets better and more productive is way less fun than conquering them, but it's also pretty important.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginAgriculturalOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces planets to make more food.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginAgriculturalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Making our meat crops and plant crops thrive better on alien worlds will mean more slavelings to do work.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginFarmingFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our planets to make food more efficiently.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginFarmingFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The business of meat crops is stinky, unpleasant work. But that's no reason not to take pride in it.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginAgriculturalMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our planets to maximize food growth.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginAgriculturalMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We now make food so efficiently that our worlds overflow with spare Drengin and slavelings. Finally their stench overwhelms that of the meat crops.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginEnvironmentOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Environmental Bashing

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginEnvironmentOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our planets to be better for various purposes.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginEnvironmentOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our research slavelings have found clever new ways to bash the land into the shape we want it.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginColonizationFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force the slavelings to adapt fully to extreme worlds.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginColonizationFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings have found a way to make life pleasant for those living on extreme worlds. Making things more pleasant doesn't sound like us; we're not sure how this mistake happened.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginBiospherePerfection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force the slavelings to adapt fully to the harshest extreme worlds.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginBiospherePerfection_Dec
StringTable.String: Now the people who live on the harshest of worlds don't have to suffer to do so. All suffering from this point on shall be intentional.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginInterstellarSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be better in a variety of ways.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginInterstellarSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Sending warships through space is great fun, and our research slavelings have thought of several ways to do it better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginIonOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our Ion Drives to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginIonOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our Ion Drives require lots of fussy work by fussy slavelings to get the most out of. If we can make them - the engines - just a little more efficient, we'll need less of them - the slavelings.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginWarpFieldFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our Warp Engines to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginWarpFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Every time we make something new, the slavelings always find new ways to improve it later. Why the slavelings can't get it right on the first try is the source of much confusion and thrashings.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginHyperwarpMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our Hyperwarp Drives to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginHyperwarpMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings mewl that our engines are already very powerful, and asked if we're satisfied with that? So we checked. It turns out we're not.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginSensorOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginSensorOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Some of the research slavelings have taken a particular interest in studying sensors, because they figure the work is safer. To keep them motivated, we'll make sure it isn't.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginEnergyFieldFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginEnergyFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: If we throw more research slavelings at our sensor systems, we're sure to see some improvements in their efficiency. Not literally throwing, but actually... sure, let's try literally throwing.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginSensorMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginSensorMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings complain that we can't see any further because of the nature of this universe. We have ordered the universe be whipped, but in the meantime, have found a few more efficiencies we could implement.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginPrecursorRelicFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Precursor Relics to be more useful.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginPrecursorRelicFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: These Precursor relics have a number of confusing benefits on our society. Although we don't really understand how this is occurring, we should force them to be better at it.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginLifeSupportOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our life support systems to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginLifeSupportOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Improving our life support systems is one of those things which sounds unnecessary, but really isn't. We need those life support systems to enable our life reduction systems to get where they need to go.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginSupportFieldFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our life support systems to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginSupportFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: We stationed a huge Drengin with an axe in the research labs, standing there, not saying a word. Almost immediately the researchers saw several places to improve our sensors. What a lucky coincidence.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginLifeSupportMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our life support systems to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginLifeSupportMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Making our life support systems better helps make our ships better, but more importantly, it also helps humiliate our ships' crewmembers.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginOrbitalSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our slavelings to be better at doing things in orbit.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginOrbitalSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: So it turns out that if we tie the orbital slavelings on to things, they can't float away as easy. This leash technology should open the door to a bunch of possible improvements.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginZeroGravityOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginZeroGravityOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we go through less slavelings when making things in space, we've discovered that some of the older and wiser ones are full of good ideas.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginOrbitalConstructionFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginOrbitalConstructionFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Building super big ships is super fun and arousing. The more we think about it, the more clever ideas we get, which only excites us more.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginHullMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginHullMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: With our ships as big as they are, often the biggest construction challenge is making sure the slavelings don't get lost. Our new "buddy system" should lead to some more construction efficiencies.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginCarrierFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our carriers to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginCarrierFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Throwing more Drengin at a problem is a good way to solve or at least annihilate that problem. We should make our carriers better to do just that.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginLogisticalOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces various logistical operations to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginLogisticalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Shooting things in space is great. But to do that we have to move a lot of things around first. Like, a lot. This is boring. But if we don't get good at it, we won't get to shoot. So we're stuck.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginWeaponsSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our weapons to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginWeaponsSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: If we focus our research on a specific way of spreading space-based misery and destruction, we'll probably be able to spread it faster.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginBeamWeaponOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our beam weapons to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginBeamWeaponOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our research slavelings seem pretty sure they can use the latest generation of materials to make our beam weapons beamier. They used more technical language though.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginHighEnergyFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our beam weapons to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginHighEnergyFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Making our beam weapons better, or at the very least brighter, is a great way to spread the good news about Drengin inventiveness to other races in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginBeamWeaponMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our beam weapons to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginBeamWeaponMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our puny research slavelings claim that physics prevents our beam weapons from becoming more efficient. "So invent new physics!" we shouted. They're working on it now.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginMissileOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our missile systems to get better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginMissileOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We have annihilated thousands of asteroids, target drones, and, accidentally, target range slavelings, and have come up with a number of possible improvements for our missiles.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginWarheadFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our missile systems to get better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginWarheadFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings seem to think that if we pay attention to the warheads of our missile systems we'll get better booms.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginPayloadMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our missile systems to get better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginPayloadMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We think we can make our missiles a bit cheaper and lighter still. The cost to our research slavelings time will be considerable, but we've ensured they don't have any hobbies, so they're ready to go.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginKineticOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our kinetic weapons to get better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginKineticOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Making our kinetic weapons better will turn the food species into food faster

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginKineticAccelerationFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our kinetic weapons to get better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginKineticAccelerationFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings are very excited about the latest superconductors. They are an excitable bunch. Then they said the superconductors will make our kinetic weapons better. Now everyone's excited.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginKineticMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our kinetic weapons to get better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginKineticMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings have been whipped to the brink of sanity, and report back that our kinetic weapons are just about as good as they can be. We'll whip them a smidge more, just to be sure.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginMilitarySpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our military to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginMilitarySpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Soldiers and guns are good and we like them. We should have more of them. And better ones! And more of them again!

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginInvasionOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us use creative invasion tactics.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginInvasionOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: When we scare the cowardly food species out of space, we'll still have to chase them down to the ground. And we should be angry at them for making us chase them.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginGravitationalFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us use dangerously creative invasion tactics.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginGravitationalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to advances in unethical behavior, we have a few new options for tenderizing the ground forces of any food species.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginDefensiveFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our defenses to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginDefensiveFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: If the food species dare try to attack our homes, we should be ready for them and all their tricky tricks.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginDefensiveSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to die less quickly.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginDefensiveSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Giving a ship something that isn't a gun is a confusing idea. But if it lets them use their guns more, then that's ok we guess.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginShieldOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our shields to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginShieldOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings have reviewed reports of how our shield systems have behaved in battle, and come up with several possible improvements we can make.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginBarrierSystemFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our shields to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginBarrierSystemFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: We brought in some new research slavelings who say they can do a better job with our shields than the old ones, and the old ones should be beaten. No love lost amongst those slavelings.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginShieldMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our shields to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginShieldMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We brought back the old research slavelings because they claimed that if we whipped their replacements enough, they could find a way to improve the shields some more.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginPointDefenseOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our point defenses to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginPointDefenseOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: There are still a number of ways we can optimize our point defense systems, if we're willing to spend the effort on cowardly defensive technology, that is.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginCounterMeasureFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our point defenses to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginCounterMeasureFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: After locking them in a room with highly powerful transmitters for a few days, the research slavelings all have headaches, as well as a number of clever ways for improving our ECM systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginDroneSystemMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our point defenses to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginDroneSystemMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: If we can make our drone systems even a little more efficient, we should be able to see significant cost or weight savings. Which is almost as good as researching a new gun, we suppose.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginArmorOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our armor to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginArmorOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Armor is good and honest and we like it. We should make it better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginArmorFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our armor to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginArmorFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Armor is getting complex, which is confusing and bad, but it keeps us alive longer, which is still good. Making it better is harder, but we should still do that.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginArmorMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our armor to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginArmorMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our armor is thick enough to stop all but the meanest food species from hurting us. But we can probably still make it a little lighter or cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginDiplomaticSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our words to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginDiplomaticSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Paying attention to the words you speak is just the most boring garbage thing to do. But if we get good at it, we might be able to convince the food species to self tenderize or something.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginPoliticalSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our politicians to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginPoliticalSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: How we organize all the Drengin and slavelings into an effective conquering force is very, very important, in a kind of boring way.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginPoliticalFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our politicians to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginPoliticalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weakest, palest slavelings have come up with a few new ways we could organize our people, which might make them better at eating the food species.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginPoliticalMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Drenginize - Political Mastery

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginPoliticalMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our politicians to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginPoliticalMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: With the right technology, we can now begin injecting our political systems directly into people's faces, making this whole politics business a lot easier, and frankly, more fun.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginDiplomaticOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our treaties to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginDiplomaticOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Diplomatic treaties are a great way to make the food species give us things. We can then use those things for making ships that can go eat the food species. Diplomacy can be fun after all.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginAllianceFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our alliances to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginAllianceFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: An alliance is a strange concept, but it essentially means a food species who we will eat last, if at all. A troubling notion, though it might make sense for some of the gristlier food species.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginCulturalOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our culture to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginCulturalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Spending time and energy on making art things is distasteful, so the least we can do is make the art things more efficiently.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginCulturalFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our culture to be more focused.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginCulturalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: If we make our art things appealing to specific people, those people will like us more. They will not be given a choice.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginCommerceSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our economy to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginCommerceSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: "Targeted" economic policies makes them sound really exciting and militaristic. They're not though. They're still boring spreadsheet garbage.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginEconomicFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our economy to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginEconomicFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The Drengin and slavelings responsible for making money are full of clever ways to make more of it. It's almost a little unseemly.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginTradeOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our traders to target specific markets.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginTradeOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: By convincing our traders to menace particular markets with threats of savings and big value, we should be able to increase our income.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginTradeFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our traders to target specific markets.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginTradeFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: We should continue inflicting the menace that are Drengin traders on specific economic sectors that we wish to ravage.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginApprovalFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces various planets to be happier.

StringTable.Label: Return_DrenginApprovalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our regular program of inspirational beatings is no longer capable of delivering the approval benefits we need. We should begin targeting our inspiration more carefully.
